title: "KAIST develops robot skin that can sense tactility and recover from injury"
excerpt: "The Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST) said its research team has developed a robot skin that can sense various external tactile stimuli and recover from injury when it is cut or damaged."
